verses.verse: <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> thirty-one <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and his mother's <S%H8034>name<s%> [was] <S%H3040>Jedidah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> of <S%H1218>Bozkath.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his father <S%H1>David,<s%> <S%H1732>nor<s%> did he <S%H3808>turn<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the <S%H5493>right<s%> or to the <S%H3225>left.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about in the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H683>Azaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%> the <S%H9373>scribe,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H5927>"Go<s%> up to <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> that he may <S%H8552>count<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H8104>doorkeepers<s%> <S%H5592><s%> have <S%H622>gathered<s%> from the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"And let them <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4399>workmen<s%> who have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and let them <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H4399>workmen<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>damages<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>

to the <S%H2796>carpenters<s%> and the <S%H1129>builders<s%> and the <S%H1443>masons<s%> and for <S%H7069>buying<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>hewn<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H389>"Only<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2803>accounting<s%> shall be made with them for the <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> for they <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H530>faithfully.<s%>"

Then <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H9373>scribe,<s%> "I have <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>" And <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> who <S%H7121>read<s%> it.

And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H9373>scribe<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5413>emptied<s%> out the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4399>workmen<s%> who have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

Moreover, <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H9373>scribe<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2518>"Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me a <S%H5612>book.<s%>" And <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> it in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> that he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4320>Micaiah,<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H9373>scribe,<s%> and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the king's <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for me and the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book<s%> that has been <S%H4672>found,<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that <S%H3341>burns<s%> against us, <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> our fathers have not <S%H1>listened<s%> to the <S%H8085>words<s%> of <S%H1697>this<s%> <S%H2088>book,<s%> to <S%H5612>do<s%> according to <S%H6213>all<s%> that is <S%H3605>written<s%> <S%H3789>concerning<s%> us."

So <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> <S%H5907>Achbor,<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H2468>Huldah<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616>Tikvah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2745>Harhas,<s%> <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H899>wardrobe<s%> (now she <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the <S%H4932>Second<s%> Quarter); and they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to her.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>'Tell<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to me,

<S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> and on its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> [even] <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H7121>read.<s%>

<S%H8478>"Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> Me and have <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> that they might <S%H3707>provoke<s%> Me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> therefore My <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H3341>burns<s%> against <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>"'

"But to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> who <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "[Regarding] the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H8085>heard,<s%>

<S%H3282>because<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender<s%> and you <S%H3665>humbled<s%> <S%H3665>yourself<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> its <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> that they should <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> and you have <S%H7167>torn<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Me, I <S%H1571>truly<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> you, <S%H5002>"declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H622>gather<s%> you to your fathers, and you shall be <S%H1>gathered<s%> to your <S%H622>grave<s%> in <S%H6913>peace,<s%> <S%H7965>neither<s%> shall your <S%H3808>eyes<s%> <S%H5869>see<s%> <S%H7200>all<s%> the <S%H3605>evil<s%> <S%H9567>which<s%> I will <S%H834>bring<s%> on <S%H935>this<s%> <S%H2088>place.<s%>"' "So they <S%H4725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H7725>word<s%> to the <S%H1697>king.<s%>
